body_html:
I too am getting segmentation fault with pytorch. Could you please help resolve this?
Attached log of gdb where

Thread 7 "python" received signal SIGSEGV, Segmentation fault.
[Switching to Thread 0x7fff930b8780 (LWP 20222)]
0x000055555af55200 in ?? ()
(gdb) where
#0 0x000055555af55200 in ?? ()
#1 0x00007fffcb2558cf in mkl_blas_avx2_s_generic_fullacopybcopy () from /home/vsl1/environments/october/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/lib/libcaffe2.so
#2 0x00007fff5d47187f in mkl_blas_avx2_xsgemm () from /home/vsl1/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/scipy/sparse/linalg/isolve/../../../../../../libmkl_avx2.so
#3 0x00007fffe04a6601 in mkl_blas_sgemm_host () from /home/vsl1/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/scipy/sparse/linalg/isolve/../../../../../../libmkl_intel_thread.so
#4 0x00007fffe04d353b in mkl_blas_sgemm () from /home/vsl1/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/scipy/sparse/linalg/isolve/../../../../../../libmkl_intel_thread.so
#5 0x00007fffe2361d93 in sgemm_ () from /home/vsl1/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/scipy/sparse/linalg/isolve/../../../../../../libmkl_intel_lp64.so
#6 0x00007ffff330f0b0 in sgemm_ () from /home/vsl1/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/numpy/core/../../../../libmkl_rt.so
#7 0x00007fffc817bde1 in THFloatBlas_gemm () from /home/vsl1/environments/october/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/lib/libcaffe2.so
#8 0x00007fffc8147d04 in THFloatTensor_addmm () from /home/vsl1/environments/october/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/lib/libcaffe2.so
#9 0x00007fffc81eb66f in THNN_FloatSpatialConvolutionMM_updateOutput_frame(THTensor*, THTensor*, THTensor*, THTensor*, THTensor*, int, int, int, int, int, int, long, long, long, long, long, long) () from /home/vsl1/environments/october/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/lib/libcaffe2.so
#10 0x00007fffc81eb75a in THNN_FloatSpatialConvolutionMM_updateOutput._omp_fn.90 () from /home/vsl1/environments/october/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/lib/libcaffe2.so
#11 0x00007ffff1931ac3 in __kmp_invoke_microtask () from /home/vsl1/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/numpy/../../../libiomp5.so
#12 0x00007ffff1900257 in __kmp_invoke_task_func () from /home/vsl1/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/numpy/../../../libiomp5.so
#13 0x00007ffff18ff8d5 in __kmp_launch_thread () from /home/vsl1/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/numpy/../../../libiomp5.so
#14 0x00007ffff1931fa4 in _INTERNAL_26_______src_z_Linux_util_cpp_16f8393c::__kmp_launch_worker(void*) ()
from /home/vsl1/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/numpy/../../../libiomp5.so
#15 0x00007ffff7bc16ba in start_thread (arg=0x7fff930b8780) at pthread_create.c:333
#16 0x00007ffff78f741d in clone () at ../sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/x86_64/clone.S:109
(gdb)

Thanks

body:
I too am getting segmentation fault with pytorch. Could you please help resolve this?
Attached log of gdb where


Thread 7 "python" received signal SIGSEGV, Segmentation fault.
[Switching to Thread 0x7fff930b8780 (LWP 20222)]
0x000055555af55200 in ?? ()
(gdb) where
#0  0x000055555af55200 in ?? ()
#1  0x00007fffcb2558cf in mkl_blas_avx2_s_generic_fullacopybcopy () from /home/vsl1/environments/october/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/lib/libcaffe2.so
#2  0x00007fff5d47187f in mkl_blas_avx2_xsgemm () from /home/vsl1/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/scipy/sparse/linalg/isolve/../../../../../../libmkl_avx2.so
#3  0x00007fffe04a6601 in mkl_blas_sgemm_host () from /home/vsl1/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/scipy/sparse/linalg/isolve/../../../../../../libmkl_intel_thread.so
#4  0x00007fffe04d353b in mkl_blas_sgemm () from /home/vsl1/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/scipy/sparse/linalg/isolve/../../../../../../libmkl_intel_thread.so
#5  0x00007fffe2361d93 in sgemm_ () from /home/vsl1/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/scipy/sparse/linalg/isolve/../../../../../../libmkl_intel_lp64.so
#6  0x00007ffff330f0b0 in sgemm_ () from /home/vsl1/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/numpy/core/../../../../libmkl_rt.so
#7  0x00007fffc817bde1 in THFloatBlas_gemm () from /home/vsl1/environments/october/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/lib/libcaffe2.so
#8  0x00007fffc8147d04 in THFloatTensor_addmm () from /home/vsl1/environments/october/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/lib/libcaffe2.so
#9  0x00007fffc81eb66f in THNN_FloatSpatialConvolutionMM_updateOutput_frame(THTensor*, THTensor*, THTensor*, THTensor*, THTensor*, int, int, int, int, int, int, long, long, long, long, long, long) () from /home/vsl1/environments/october/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/lib/libcaffe2.so
#10 0x00007fffc81eb75a in THNN_FloatSpatialConvolutionMM_updateOutput._omp_fn.90 () from /home/vsl1/environments/october/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/lib/libcaffe2.so
#11 0x00007ffff1931ac3 in __kmp_invoke_microtask () from /home/vsl1/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/numpy/../../../libiomp5.so
#12 0x00007ffff1900257 in __kmp_invoke_task_func () from /home/vsl1/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/numpy/../../../libiomp5.so
#13 0x00007ffff18ff8d5 in __kmp_launch_thread () from /home/vsl1/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/numpy/../../../libiomp5.so
#14 0x00007ffff1931fa4 in _INTERNAL_26_______src_z_Linux_util_cpp_16f8393c::__kmp_launch_worker(void*) ()
   from /home/vsl1/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/numpy/../../../libiomp5.so
#15 0x00007ffff7bc16ba in start_thread (arg=0x7fff930b8780) at pthread_create.c:333
#16 0x00007ffff78f741d in clone () at ../sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/x86_64/clone.S:109

Thanks
